name: demo-ecommerce-backend
description: Demo eCommerce BackEnd - API supplier and Swagger Docs

scripts.test-mochawesome: npm run test-basic -- --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir='./dist/test-results/',reportFilename='index',reportPageTitle='demo-ecommerce-test mocha test results',inline=true,cdn=true,charts=true
scripts.test: npm run test-basic -- --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir='./dist/test-results/',reportFilename='index',reportPageTitle='demo-ecommerce-test mocha test results',inline=true,cdn=true,charts=true,autoOpen=true
scripts.jsdoc: npm run jsdoc-swagger && npm run jsdoc-code
scripts.swagger: npm run jsdoc-swagger && npm run swagger-ui && http-server ./dist/api
scripts.docs-build: npm run jsdoc && npm run swagger-ui && npm run docs-readme
scripts.docs: npm run test-mochawesome && npm run test-report && npm run docs-build
scripts.build: npm run dev-clean && npm run lint && npm run docs
